title: Adverse Drug Event Extraction (CADEC)
description: Named entity recognition for adverse drug events from patient-reported experiences, based on the CADEC corpus (Karimi et al., 2015). Annotates drugs, adverse effects, symptoms, diseases, and findings from colloquial health forum posts with mapping to medical vocabularies (SNOMED-CT, MedDRA).
paperReference: Karimi et al., J Biomed Inform 2015
citation:
@article{karimi2015cadec,
    title = "Cadec: A corpus of adverse drug event annotations",
    author = "Karimi, Sarvnaz  and Metke-Jimenez, Alejandro  and Kemp, Madonna  and Wang, Chen",
    journal = "Journal of Biomedical Informatics",
    volume = "55",
    pages = "73--81",
    year = "2015",
    publisher = "Elsevier",
    url = "https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25817970/"
}
